Important notice, extensive hotel renovations are taking place until late 2025. You may experience disturbances and noise from 9:00 until 18:00 daily.

The Kingsgate Hotel is just a short stroll to major city attractions including Marvel Stadium, Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, Crown Entertainment Complex and The Melbourne Aquarium. It is also located in the free tram zone offering easy access to the city's galleries and museums, the lively restaurant, café, and bar scene, the shopping district, Waterfront City, Queen Victoria Market, and plenty more.

Off-site car parking (5 minute walk) can be arranged at our 24-hour reception desk (fees apply).

All guest rooms have free unlimited Wi-Fi, are air-conditioned equipped with a desk, tea and coffee making facilities, an iron and ironing board, fridge, flat screen TV, a safety deposit box, and an ensuite bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy breakfast in the Kingsgate Café, and access to our small fitness centre.
title: ibis Styles Kingsgate Hotel

description:
Roamer Melbourne - formerly Selina Central Melbourne is located in the heart of Melbourne CBD, directly opposite Flinders Street Station. It is just a 2-minute walk from St Paul's Cathedral and Federation Square, and Rod Laver Arena and Crown Casino are both a 5-minute, free tram ride away.

The updated reception area is attended 24 hours a day and free WiFi is available throughout the property. There are shared kitchen facilities, which allow you to make yourself a meal, as well as Netflix in the communal TV/lounge area. You can also choose to grab a drink at the onsite bar.

The renovated private rooms provide the amenities needed for a comfortable stay and guests can enjoy secure card access, lift entry to the top floors and iconic views of Melbourne’s historic landmarks and the famous Degraves Street laneway. The shared dormitory rooms feature individual lockers and bedside light. Bed linen is provided for all guests and rooms are serviced daily. Free luggage storage is available for all early check-in’s and late departures.
title: Roamer Melbourne - formerly Selina Central Melbourne

description:
Located 1 km north of Melbourne CBD (Central Business District), Miami Hotel Melbourne offers rooms with limited unlimited free WiFi.

Errol Street North Melbourne has a range of shops and is only 5 minutes' walk away. A free tram zone and the Queen Victoria Markets are only 10 minutes' walk away.

All rooms include centrally controlled heating and cooling, a private bathroom, tea/coffee making facilities and a small refrigerator. A TV with cable channels and some free-to-air-channels is also included.

Miami Hotel offers a coin laundry, communal kitchen, TV lounge, luggage storage and a 24 hour manned reception.
title: Miami Hotel Melbourne

description:
Offering a rooftop sundeck and Best Western Melbourne City is conveniently located in Melbourne CBD. It is located 3 minutes' walk from Southern Cross Station, Crown Casino and Melbourne Convention Centre.

Marvel Stadium, Melbourne Aquarium and South Wharf DFO are 5 minutes’ walk from the property. The free City Circle tram stops directly outside the hotel.

All rooms at Best Western Melbourne City include air conditioning and free cable TV. Each room features modern furnishings, a small refrigerator, ironing facilities, plus an en suite bathroom. The Courtyard rooms are pet-friendly.
title: Best Western Melbourne City

description:
Located in Melbourne’s CBD (Central Business District), ibis Melbourne Hotel and Apartments offers modern accommodation in a convenient position. The hotel features a restaurant and bar. All guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel. "The hotel has on-site parking."

Ibis Melbourne Hotel and Apartments is only 2 minutes’ walk from Queen Victoria Market, and is close to the Lygon Street restaurant precinct, Emporium Melbourne and Melbourne Central shopping centres. Located in the free tram zone, the closest tram stop is only 2 minutes' away on Elizabeth Street, and Melbourne Central Railway Station is only a 7 minute walk away.

ibis Kitchen Restaurant offers breakfast daily.

All rooms are air conditioned, and include a work desk and tea and coffee making facilities. Most rooms also have a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. ibis Melbourne Hotel and Apartments offers a 24-hour reception desk and dry cleaning services. The tour desk can recommend local attractions and help guests with travel arrangements.
title: ibis Melbourne Hotel and Apartments

description:
Recently refurbished, City Limits Hotel modern interior décor and our friendly staffs are here to ensure your stay is comfortable and enjoyable. The City Limits Hotel, a newly refurbished 4-star hotel provides studio apartments in the heart of Chinatown and near Melbourne's theatre district. Her Majesty's Theatre and the Princess Theatre are both 2 minutes' walk away.
City Limits features 32 Hotel Rooms with an air conditioner/heater, direct dial telephones, data port for high speed broadband Internet access Wireless (Wi-Fi enabled), remote control colour LCD TV with satellite channels including movies, sport and news, work desk, iron and board, kitchenette comprising of microwave oven, toaster, kettle, fridge, crockery, cutlery and glassware. Our en-suite bathrooms all contain a shower, bath, toilet, hand basin and hairdryer with new Australian Amenities from our partners at Urban Jungle. Rooms have Australia made Sealy beds and windows that can be open for fresh air. Reception desk is open 24hrs a day for any questions or assistance you nay need anytime of the day! Our professional and friendly team will make your stay amazing . Car parking available on request. All in all, City Limits Hotel is a great place of stay, if you are visiting Melbourne.
"We look forward to welcoming you to the New City Limits Hotel!"
title: City Limits Hotel Apartments

description:
Gordon House Apartments is ideally situated in Melbourne, and features an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as St Paul's Cathedral, Block Arcade Melbourne, and Melbourne City Conference Centre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 100 metres from Princess Theatre.

All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms are fitted with a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher. At Gordon House Apartments the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include State Library of Victoria, Melbourne Central Station and Federation Square. The nearest airport is Essendon Fields Airport, 11 km from Gordon House Apartments.
